item.title: Towards Cross-Lingual Audio Abuse Detection in Low-Resource Settings with Few-Shot Learning
item.description: Few-shot learning empowers cross-lingual audio abuse detection using pre-trained models, achieving high accuracy in low-resource Indian languages.
